item.title: Adding a CSV volume to a Cluster
item.description: So, now you are at the point where you need to present a CSV Volume to your cluster. I have created this guide to make your life a little easier. Doing this is actually quite simple, but there are a few gotchas. Gotcha 1 : If you create / carve the LUN and forget to allow multiple access, only the first IQN / WWN will be able to access it.
